title: Conserving our soil today
brief_description: Techniques and experiments in soil conservation including the use of plastic sheets to retain moisture, subsoil mulching, new fertilisers, and experiments with artificial rain to determine patterns of soil erosion. The more common methods of conservation; the dependence of the individual on the products of the soil.
